name: The Tails Show Fighters 4
description:
Note: I don't own Saito or Aege, they are owned by their respective owners. Their coding comes from the talented people over at the KBB team, so cheers to them.

Tails, Knuckles & Thomas are back for another butt kicking season of The Tails Show Fighters 4, where the action doesn't get more action than this.

  • 12 playable characters
  • a bunch of stages
  • Echo Fighters!

This game runs in the Ikemen GO Engine, so expect not as many people to get access to it.
